lead_paragraph: An Iraqi official said the three Americans were kidnapped from a “suspicious apartment” in the Dora neighborhood, a former haven for Al Qaeda in Iraq, the Islamic State’s predecessor.

byline.contributor: Falih Hassan and Omar Al-Jawoshy contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Americans in Baghdad Abducted From Apartment, Officials Say
headline.main: Missing Americans in Baghdad Taken From Apartment, Officials Say

snippet: An Iraqi official said the three Americans were kidnapped from a “suspicious apartment” in the Dora neighborhood, a former haven for Al Qaeda in Iraq, the Islamic State’s predecessor.
abstract: Security officials in Iraq suggest three missing American contractors working at Baghdad airport were abducted; crime is first kidnapping of Americans in several years and source of chagrin for Iraqi government under pressure to secure city against Islamic State insurgents.
